price: Ẹ jà wọ́n lógun. Allāhu yóò jẹ wọ́n níyà láti ọwọ́ yín. Ó máa yẹpẹrẹ wọn. Ó máa ràn yín lọ́wọ́ lórí wọn. Ó sì máa wo ọkàn ìjọ onígbàgbọ́ òdodo sàn.
arabic: قَٰتِلُوهُمۡ يُعَذِّبۡهُمُ ٱللَّهُ بِأَيۡدِيكُمۡ وَيُخۡزِهِمۡ وَيَنصُرۡكُمۡ عَلَيۡهِمۡ وَيَشۡفِ صُدُورَ قَوۡمٖ مُّؤۡمِنِينَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: qātilūhum yuʿadhib'humu al-lahu bi-aydīkum wayukh'zihim wayanṣur'kum ʿalayhim wayashfi ṣudūra qawmin mu'minīna
